text: @RealDeanCain My Doctor boyfriend that works with COVID-19 patients every single shift (12-15hrs a day wearing full PPE) told me to post this, just DM me if you are interested in volunteering at his Hospital Mr. Cain https://t.co/VHirJ2mCVt
